name: jira-tempo-cast
title: Tempo Time Tracking
author: BishopCodes
description: Log time to Jira issues using Tempo. Timer, backfill week, and AI summaries.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: jiraBaseUrl
preferences.description: Your Jira instance base URL (e.g., your-domain.atlassian.net)
preferences.title: Jira Base URL

preferences.name: jiraEmail
preferences.description: Your Jira email address used for authentication
preferences.title: Jira Email

preferences.name: jiraApiToken
preferences.description: Your Jira API token (create one at https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens)
preferences.title: Jira API Token

preferences.name: tempoApiToken
preferences.description: Your Tempo API token (create one at https://<your-domain>.atlassian.net/plugins/servlet/ac/io.tempo.jira/tempo-app#!/configuration/api-integration)
preferences.title: Tempo API Token

preferences.name: roundingMode
preferences.description: Rounding mode for timer and backfill operations
preferences.title: Rounding Mode (Timer & Backfill)

preferences.name: timeInputMethod
preferences.description: Choose how to input time duration and start time
preferences.title: Time Input Method

preferences.name: githubModel
preferences.description: GitHub Copilot model ID to use for AI features. Use 'Tempo: View Available AI Models' command to see all supported models.
preferences.title: GitHub Model

preferences.name: aiLookbackWeeks
preferences.description: Number of weeks to analyze for AI pattern suggestions
preferences.title: AI Pattern Lookback Period

preferences.name: enableGitHubPRs
preferences.description: Show Jira issues from your GitHub PRs and commits in Backfill Week view
preferences.title: Enable GitHub PR Suggestions
preferences.label: Show issues from GitHub PRs

preferences.name: timerNotifyAt
preferences.description: Hours at which to notify about long-running timers (comma-separated, e.g., 1,4,8)
preferences.title: Timer Notification Hours

preferences.name: ollamaModel
preferences.description: Ollama model to use for AI summaries
preferences.title: Ollama Model

commands.name: quick-log
commands.title: Tempo: Quick Log Time
commands.description: Quickly log time using natural language (e.g., ABC-123 2h working on feature)

commands.name: authorize-github
commands.title: Tempo: Authorize GitHub Copilot
commands.description: Authorize GitHub Copilot for AI features using OAuth

commands.name: authorize-github-pat
commands.title: Tempo: Authorize GitHub PAT
commands.description: Set your GitHub Personal Access Token for PR/commit access (requires 'repo' scope)

commands.name: view-models
commands.title: Tempo: View Available AI Models
commands.description: View and refresh list of available GitHub Copilot models

commands.name: log-time
commands.title: Tempo: Log Time
commands.description: Log time to a Jira issue using Tempo
commands.subtitle: Create worklog via Tempo

commands.name: start-timer
commands.title: Tempo: Start Timer
commands.description: Start a timer for a Jira issue using Tempo

commands.name: stop-timer
commands.title: Tempo: Active Timer
commands.description: View active timer (live) & stop/log when ready

commands.name: backfill-week
commands.title: Tempo: Backfill Week (Quick Entry)
commands.description: Backfill time for a week using Tempo

commands.name: browse-github-prs
commands.title: Tempo: Browse GitHub PRs for Issues
commands.description: Browse your GitHub PRs and commits to find Jira issues for time logging

commands.name: ai-summary
commands.title: Tempo: AI Summary (Week)
commands.description: Generate an AI summary of your worklogs for the week

commands.name: manage-queries
commands.title: Tempo: Manage JQL Queries
commands.description: Add, edit, remove saved JQL queries

commands.name: timer-menu
commands.title: Tempo Timer
commands.description: Show active timer in menu bar
